title: Bright & Modern 2/2  Apt - view of downtown
posting_body: Bright 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment that feels more like a house than an apartment available for rent October 15th.
It's a corner apartment, which means you only have one neighbor.
Apartment is first floor - easy move in but because building is on a hill, it feels like you are on second floor without the second floor inconvenience.
Nice large balcony overlooking downtown and a beautiful view of the capitol.
In unit W/D with plenty of closet space and renovated kitchen/appliances.
There is free garage parking for 2 cars as well as free convenient garage guest parking.
If you have pets, there is a convenient outdoor fenced in area right outside your apartment door.
There is a wonderful sunny pool with gas grills.
There is also a very nicely furnished gym with all the needed machines and weights as well as a game room with pool and shuffle ball with a free Starbucks coffee machine.
The best apartment I have ever lived in in Austin - and I've lived pretty much everywhere.
You are in walking distance to all the fun Eastside bars and restaurants and downtown as well as the famous Franklins BBQ which is across the street.
Would be happy to show apartment as well as a virtual tour.
Serious inquiries only, please, and all arrangements will be handled after through leasing office.
